settings.store_list:
GENERAL QUESTIONS

Did Russell Westbrook create Honor the Gift?
Yes, Honor The Gift was founded by Russell Westbrook who acts as the creative director of the brand. 
 
How do Honor The Gift items fit?
T-Shirts
T-Shirts fit true to size. If you typically wear a Large, order a large. 
Fleece
Crewnecks and Hoodies fit true to size with a little extra room which is how we like it, but if you like it snug order a size down. 
Shorts
S - 30 Waist M - 32 Waist L - 34 Waist XL - 36 Waist
 
Are there any plans of re-releasing past collections/items?
Typically we don’t re-release anything. We are always working towards the future and making sure each release is special. If it sold out it most likely isn’t coming back. That being said follow our Instagram or sign up for our newsletter to know all release announcements.
 
I have a question. Who can I contact?
We are open Monday to Friday between 10AM-6PM PST and closed during all national holidays. [E] help@honorthegift.co
Most emails will responded to within 24-48 hours but please allow us more time during busy periods.
 
Do you ship International?
Yes we do offer shipping worldwide. For more information read out shipping & returns section provided in the footer.
 
Where is Honor The Gift’s product produced?
All our current offering is developed and manufactured in Los Angeles, California. As we continue to develop our product range we will expand our manufacturing. 
 
Where can I find Honor The Gift in retailers?
We currently do not sell to any retailers other than our online shop. However, we’ll occasionally have special projects with specific retailers which will be indicated in our press releases.
 
What forms of payment do you accept?
We accept VISA, MasterCard, American Express, Discover and Paypal.
 
What is sales tax?
As a national retailer, Honor The Gift is required to charge applicable state and local sales tax on orders shipped to states where we have a physical presence. Below are the states, which we charge sales tax: CA.
 
How do I know my order was received?
Once you’ve completed your online order, you will receive an order confirmation email. Please check this to ensure all your details are correct. If any details for incorrect, please contact us immediately at help@honorthegift.co If you don’t receive an order confirmation email from us within 24 hours, please check your junk folder.
 
Can I change my order once placed?
Please email help@honorthegift.co and we’ll do our best to make sure you are accommodated.
